ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
especially when you are older and can afford a nice bow.
I can't wait for a darkwood.
<snip>

Darkwoods are kewl, but a Trueshot Longbow may be
cheaper. If you can find a Ranger with a Fletching
skill of 160+ then they may be willing to make the bow
for you. The only thing that would make this a pain in
the spleen is that the Micro Servos off clockworks are
now NO DROP items, and would require the maker of the
bow to loot the creature.
There was 1 ranger that teamed up with a fighter to make
the bow and they spent 3 hours running around Ak'annon
for the servos. Then they sought the quest originator
and failed many times even at 160+ skill. It is a
cheaper route (if the Fletcher is nice to try for free
because of failure rate) than a Darkwood, but very time
consuming.
I had a Ranger and was on the list. Last I heard the
quest needed a master fletcher, but that part was broken
as many people with skills of 20-45 were able to make
it. 1 person tried 40 times in a row and succeeded on
the 40th try at skill 32. Just pray to the random number
generator. They may have fixed that though.

Verant also fixed the range issue with bows. Before
every bow had an effective range of 50 even if the stats
said 150. To do max damage with the bow you need to be
almost out of range. The closer to the target the less
damage you do.
To max you skill in Archery is a long road. What worked
for my Ranger was to stand behind a MOB already engaged
and plink away at it. You will NEVER do enough damage
to kill steal and they usually like the help. You may
want to ask, but I have yet to be told "no I don't want
you to weaken this yellow MOB for me even if only by 10%"
GREEN and RED cons will not advance your skill. The
reason for this is like a deep RED resisting a spell.
Spelling it just won't happen. And GREEN is always
trivial and will never advance any skill.

A Rough Hickory Recurve Bow is cheap and can be made for
3GP cost (I think) and any Ranger should be willing to
do this. Range is the same as a Hunting Bow, but damage
is double. I hit for 11 damage consistantly at max range.

Sorry this was so long, but SKs need all the info they
can get. :)

--
Cronik
Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
6th Season Troll SK
